welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Onex, Switzerland! Get ready to experience the charm of this picturesque city known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Onex has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, primarily used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time or data limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annemasse Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Annemasse Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
